com.taursys.swing
Class MTableCellRenderer

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JLabel
                  javax.swing.table.DefaultTableCellRenderer
                      com.taursys.swing.MTableCellRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.SwingConstants, javax.swing.table.TableCellRenderer
public class MTableCellRenderer
extends javax.swing.table.DefaultTableCellRenderer

MTableCellRenderer is used by the MTableColumn to render a table cell with specific formatting. The MTableCellRenderer provides the ability to use Formatting by setting its format and formatPattern properties.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Marty Phelan
See Also:
Serialized Form

public MTableCellRenderer()

Method Detail

setValue

protected void setValue(java.lang.Object value)
Sets the underlying JLabel's text property using Format if defined. If the value is null, it will set it to an empty String ("").

Parameters:
value - to convert/format to String and store in the JLabel

setupFormat

protected void setupFormat()
Tries to applies the formatPattern to the format. This only occurs if the format and formatPattern are not null, and the format is an instance of MessageFormat, SimpleDateFormat, ChoiceFormat, or DecimalFormat.

setFormat

public void setFormat(java.text.Format newFormat)
Sets the format for this renderer which is used by setValue to format values.

Parameters:
newFormat - the format for this renderer which is used by setValue to format values.

getFormat

public java.text.Format getFormat()
Sets the format for this renderer which is used by setValue to format values.

Returns:
the format for this renderer which is used by setValue to format values.

setFormatPattern

Parameters:
